title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6206.1 - Accessibility survey to be conducted
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6206.1 - Accessibility survey to be conducted

State Regulations

The local board of elections shall cause an accessibility
survey to be conducted for every polling site designated pursuant to
subdivision 1 of section
4-104
of the

Election Law to verify substantial compliance with the accessibility standards
cited in subdivision 1-a of section
4-104
of the

Election Law. The transmittal of each survey shall be in a format and manner
prescribed by the State Board of Elections. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6206.1

Adopted, New

York State Register May 28, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 21, eff. 5/28/2014

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
